education.name: Legacy Responsive Web Desing
education.info: In this Responsive Web Design Certification, of freeCodeCamp,I been learn the basics languages that developers use to build webpages: HTML (Hypertext Markup Language) for content, and CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) for a responsive web design.

education.name: JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures
education.info: In the JavaScript Algorithm and Data Structures Certification, i been learn the fundamentals of JavaScript including variables, arrays, objects, loops, functions, Object Oriented Programming (OOP) and Functional Programming (FP).

education.name: Argentina Programa #SéProgramar
education.info: Este curso es una introducción a los fundamentos de la programación. Temas como programación imperativa, estructura de datos y programación orientada a objetos son trabajados con lenguajes como Gobstones, Ruby y Javascript.
